output.content:
I'll write 3 sentences about agentic workflow editor for you:

An agentic workflow editor empowers users to design and orchestrate automated processes where AI agents perform tasks with varying degrees of autonomy and decision-making capability. These editors typically feature visual interfaces that allow users to define sequential or parallel steps, set conditional logic, and configure how agents interact with tools, data sources, and each other. By abstracting complex automation into manageable workflows, these editors democratize access to sophisticated AI-driven processes without requiring extensive programming knowledge.
